item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Whatever you do will be insignificant, but it is very important that you do it." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Penn & Teller
item.description: "Luck is probability taken personally. It is the excitement of bad math" -- Penn & Teller

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Vandana Shiva
item.description: "Gandhi is the other person. I believe Gandhi is the only person who knew about real democracy â€” not democracy as the right to go and buy what you want, but democracy as the responsibility to be accountable to everyone around you. Democracy begins with freedom from hunger, freedom from unemployment, freedom from fear, and freedom from hatred. To me, those are the real freedoms on the basis of which good human societies are based." -- Vandana Shiva

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by John Ruskin
item.description: "What we think or what we know or what we believe is in the end of little consequence. The only thing of consequence is what we do" -- John Ruskin

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by John Kenneth Galbraith
item.description: "The only function of economic forecasting is to make astrology look respectable." -- John Kenneth Galbraith

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Shilpa add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I'm killing time while I wait for life to shower me with meaning and happiness." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Sometimes when I'm talking, my words can't keep up with my thoughts. I wonder why we think faster than we speak. Probably so we can think twice." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
Shilpa add a quote by BILL WATTERSON
item.description: "It's not denial. I'm just selective about the reality I accept." -- BILL WATTERSON

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I wish I had more friends, but people are such jerks. If you can just get most people to leave you alone, you're doing good. If you can find even one person you really like, you're lucky. And if that person can also stand you, you're really lucky." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "You can't just turn on creativity like a faucet. You have to be in the right mood. What mood is that? Last-minute panic." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Every time I've built character, I've regretted it." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "You know what's weird? Day by day, nothing seems to change, but pretty soon...everything's different." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "There's never enough time to do all the nothing you want." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "We're so busy watching out for what's just ahead of us that we don't take time to enjoy where we are." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "The purpose of writing is to inflate weak ideas, obscure poor reasoning and inhibit clarity." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Dad, how do soldiers killing each other solve the world's problems?" -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "From now on, I'm not doing anything I don't want to do! The world owes me happiness, fulfillment and success.... I'm just here to cash in." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I think life should be more like TV. I think all of life's problems ought to be solved in 30 minutes with simple homilies, don't you? I think weight and oral hygiene ought to be our biggest concerns. I think we should all have powerful, high-paying jobs, and everyone should drive fancy sports cars. All our desires should be instantly gratified. Women should always wear tight clothing, and men should carry powerful handguns. Life overall should be more glamorous, thrill-packed, and filled with applause, don't you think?... Then again, if real life was like that, what would we watch on television?" -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Waterson
item.description: "I'm learning skills I will use for the rest of my life by doing homework...procrastinating and negotiation." -- Bill Waterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "God put me on earth to accomplish certain things. Right now, Iâ€™m so far behind, Iâ€™ll never die." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "That's the difference between me and the rest of the world! Happiness isn't good enough for me! I demand euphoria!" -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Everybody I know fails the acid test of friendship." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Shilpa add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "I like maxims that don't encourage behavior modification. -Calvin" -- Bill Watterson
